global.title: CSV import
global.import_characters_text:
To import characters and groups you need a csv-file with following columns:
  • Character - contains character name.
  • Groups - optional field with character groups divived by vertical line: Location 1 | Location 2 | Group 3
  • Description - optional field with a character text description.
To import file, please, use the following form.
global.import_applications_text:
To import applications you need a csv-file with following columns:
  • Name - optional field with a character name to look for it in roles list.
  • Status - optional field with an application status, possible values: «Accepted», «Processed», «Sent», «Declined».
  • Updated - optional field with a last update date.
  • Created - optional field with a creation date.
  • Left - optional field with a sum yet to pay as a fee.
  • Paid - optional field with a sum already paid as a fee.
  • Email - optional field with a player email, by which allrpg.info will try to find him / her and propose the application immediately.
  • Character name - an application name.
Moreover csv can contain any columns, which names are precisely the same as setted in «Application setup» section. In this case allrpg.info will fill in all this fields automatically. For example: «Backstory».
To import file, please, use the following form.

messages.character_no_name: Mandatory field «Character» not set in string %s.
messages.character_already_present: A character with such name from string %s is already present in project: %s.
messages.application_no_name: Mandatory field «Character name» not set in string %s.
messages.application_already_present: An application with such name from string %s is already present in project: %s.
